page.title: 12HOUSEHOLDS IN DOLPHINTON
page.content: All the houses in Dolphinton have gardens. 71 cars are owned by people in the area, only 10 households have no means of transport, and 29 people use public transport regularly. 43 households have a pet or pets including 46 cats, 43 dogs, 5 birds, 5 fish. All households shop outside Dolphinton, but until 1985 36 households used the local shop which has now closed. 17 make use of the 3 travelling shops which come into the area. 3 household used only the local shop. It was found that of the 59 families, 7 are second generation, 6 are third, and 11 are fourth; where one of the adults had a parent, grandparent and great-grandparent who had lived here. Gardening, t.v. handicrafts, badminton, swimming, bowling, walking, horseriding, music are some of the leisure activities.
